entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of drizzle this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 1.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
